teams.strStadiumDescription: Isidoro Beaton Stadium is a multi-purpose stadium in Belmopan, Belize. It is used mostly for football matches and is the home stadium of the Belizean football clubs Belmopan Blaze and Belmopan Bandits. The stadium is able to hold 2,500 people. It is also the most commonly used Belize national football team Home Venue.
teams.strDescriptionEN:
Belmopan Bandits Sports Club is a Belizean football team which currently competes in the Premier League of Belize.

The team is based in the capital city of Belize, Belmopan. The team currently plays its home games at Isidoro Beaton Stadium in Belmopan. The stadium can hold 2,500 spectators.

Belmopan have occasionally held home games in international competitions at FFB Stadium in Belmopan, which has a capacity of 5,000 spectators.
